sentences.en: She attended a convent school and went to Mass each day.
sentences.cn: 她上了一所女修道院设立的学校，每天都去作弥撒。

sentences.en: This abbreviation had been adopted in the convent.
sentences.cn: 这个简称是在那修院里用惯了的。

sentences.en: I was to leave the convent and help the poor while living among them.
sentences.cn: 我在穷人中生活着，我要走出修道院，去帮助他们。
